name: Git Gud or Get Rekt
description:
One of the hardest games on steam. Classic, old school, 2D bullet hell in a form of a space shooter. Free to play and no microtransactions. I made it for fun.

You need to git gud or you will be rekt a lot. Can you beat level one?

Stay tuned for the next game from IQ Software, a true homage to Mount & Blade series. It's gonna be fun!
